p: To a mixture of the enaminone 6 (0.005 mol) in glacial acetic acid (15 mL), 2-aminobenz- imidazole or 2-aminothiazole was added. The mixture was allowed to react under reflux for 2 h., and the excess solvent was evaporated under vacuum. The solid was collected by filtration, washed with water, dried, and recrystallized from the suitable solvent to give the products 11and 12.
